title: Networks Urge Caution on a Chaotic Midterm Night
description: “Wait for more votes,” warned CNN’s John King, as wary anchors tried to avoid any predictions that might go awry.
dc:creator: Michael M. Grynbaum, John Koblin and Jeremy W. Peters
media:description: Bill Hemmer of Fox News. Like other networks, Fox told viewers that final results would take time.
